<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="127" y="8"><field name="trigger">player_left_click_block</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:BecomingaShardbearer</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_issneaking"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Shardblade</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:recievedShardBlade</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:shardBladeClock</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">172</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">.86 heartbeats a second => 8.6s for 10 heartbeats

172 ticks = 8.6s</comment></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Shardblade</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:recievedShardBlade</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Shardblade</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:recievedShardBlade</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
